underlying_goal: Align campaign Kanban and detail page layouts to match the posts page styling, and add published post counts to campaign cards/tables
friction_detail: Initially displayed published post count as 'X out of Y' format when user wanted two separate numbers with distinct icons.
brief_summary: User wanted campaign pages to mirror posts page layout and add published post counts; Claude delivered all changes across 8+ files in frontend and backend with minor display format correction.
